last_episode_to_air.name: The truth will come out
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sanna and Marcus' relationship crashes and Marcus looks elsewhere for comfort. Tanja tries to get to the truth at any cost.

name: The Dark Heart
overview: Sanna is the 21-year-old daughter of a rich landowner in southern Sweden. Her father, Bengt, makes his fortune by leasing his vast expanse of inherited land to hardworking family farmers, many of whom struggle to make ends meet. Stern and unyielding, Bengt holds influence over those less fortunate, while Sanna struggles with the idea of becoming his heir apparent. When she begins a relationship with Marcus, the penniless son of a nearby farmer, her father issues an ultimatum — leave Marcus or lose her inheritance.

episodes.name: Families in feud
episodes.overview: Lovebirds Sanna and Marcus' families are in conflict. Volunteer Tanja is given a new mission - to search for a man who has been missing for two years.

episodes.name: Suspects
episodes.overview: Sanna's father forces her to choose between the family business and Marcus. Tanja starts searching for the missing man and finds some suspects.

episodes.name: Unexpected help
episodes.overview: Sanna and Marcus' plan backfires when they run into financial trouble. Tanja is about to give up but gets unexpected help.

episodes.name: Under pressure
episodes.overview: Sanna and Marcus are under pressure from several sides. Tanja decides to find the truth herself and approaches the suspects.

episodes.name: The truth will come out
episodes.overview: Sanna and Marcus' relationship crashes and Marcus looks elsewhere for comfort. Tanja tries to get to the truth at any cost.
